summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Solana Soldier trading bot. All backend APIs working correctly, frontend landing page and dashboard fully functional, Telegram bot responding to API calls. 13/13 backend tests passed (100% success rate). All features from the review request verified: health check, system status with live_trading_enabled=true, trading stats, stats endpoint, frontend landing page, Launch Bot button linking to correct Telegram URL (t.me/Cfsolanasoldier_bot), and Telegram bot getMe API.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/ returns status=online (health check)
Backend API /api/system-status returns live_trading_enabled=true
Backend API /api/system-status returns auto_trade_on_whale_signal=true
Backend API /api/system-status shows helius_rpc_connected=true, jupiter_dex_ready=true, whale_monitor_active=true
Backend API /api/system-status shows 9 tracked whale wallets
Backend API /api/system-status shows min_trade_sol=0.02, max_trade_sol=0.5
Backend API /api/trading-stats returns trading statistics with live_trading_enabled=true
Backend API /api/stats returns user statistics (total_users, active_wallets, total_trades, total_profit_usd, whale_activities_today)
Backend API /api/whales returns 9 tracked whale wallets
Backend API /api/whale-activities returns whale activity list
Backend API /api/sol-price returns current SOL price
Backend API /api/trending-tokens returns trending tokens list
Backend API /api/pnl-stats returns P&L statistics
Backend API /api/users returns user list
Backend API /api/trades returns trade list
Backend API /api/payments returns payment list
Telegram bot getMe API returns ok=true with username=Cfsolanasoldier_bot
Frontend landing page loads without errors
Frontend landing page shows SOLANA SOLDIER branding
Frontend Launch Bot button links to correct URL (https://t.me/Cfsolanasoldier_bot)
Frontend Get Started button links to Telegram bot
Frontend shows all 4 feature cards (Real-Time Tracking, Lightning Fast, Anti-Rug Protection, $2 Profit Target)
Frontend pricing section shows Â£100/day with SOL/ETH/BTC payment options
Frontend Live Stats panel shows Tracked Whales: 9+, Daily Trades: 100+, Profit Target: $2/trade, Trade Time: <2 min
Frontend dashboard loads at /dashboard route
Frontend dashboard shows all 5 stat cards (Total Users, Active Wallets, Total Trades, Total Profit, Whale Alerts)
Frontend dashboard shows SOL price in header
Frontend dashboard has all 7 tabs working (Overview, Trending, Rugcheck, Whales, Trades, Users, Payments)
Frontend dashboard Trading Engine section shows Profit Target: $2/trade, Max Trade Time: 120s
Frontend dashboard rugcheck input and button functional
critical_code_review_comments: Backend logs show occasional 'Conflict: terminated by other getUpdates request' - this is expected when multiple bot instances try to poll simultaneously, not a critical issue
Admin chat ID -4993252670 shows bot was kicked from group - admin may need to re-add bot to group for notifications
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. Backend has 13 API endpoints tested and passing. Frontend landing page and dashboard fully functional. Telegram bot is running and responding to API calls. The bot was previously kicked from admin group chat (-4993252670) - admin may need to re-add bot for group notifications. WebSocket whale monitoring is connected and tracking 9 whale wallets.
